announcements.headline: Aerial Yogalates in March!
announcements.body: Aerial Yogalates - Fridays in March 12:30 to 1:30.  Contact Tracy or Stacy or message us on Facebook.

announcements.headline: Come try TRX lunchtime workout!
announcements.body:
TRX (Total Resistance Exercise) is a drop in class on Mondays & Wednesdays 12:15 to 1:00 pm. 
$5 per class.
Low impact and scalable for all fitness levels.

announcements.headline: Try any regularly scheduled martial arts class for free!
announcements.body: Just try to let the instructor know you're coming & show up a few minutes early. ðŸ˜‰ See the calendar link below for class schedules.

announcements.headline: We no longer offer individual gym memberships.
announcements.body:
We are no longer able to offer gym memberships. Sorry for any disappointment.
Class members and PT clients may use the gym during class/training hours and for pre-class warm-up.
